=== Ayatana Patches ===

This page gathers the set of patches produced as part of the Ayatana initiative.

Most of the patches come from the notify-osd & messaging menu developments.

They are referenced as bug numbers in https://wiki.ubuntu.com/NotifyOSD

* http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=423186
* http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=570499
* http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=107607
* gnome-settings-daemon patches for synchronous notifications: XXX (Macslow)
* gnome-power-manager patches for synchronous notifications: XXX (Macslow)
* Pidgin-libnotify patches: http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&aid=2614312&group_id=144907&atid=760301 (ted)
* Evolution-plugin: we're the upstream here
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/kerneloops/+bug/344377|kerneloops]]</nowiki> patch to check for actions rejected upstream (kenvandine)
* bluez-gnome patch hasn't been accepted yet, but karmic will use gnome-bluetooth, <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=584857|patch submitted]]</nowiki>
